about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
In this truly special experience you will find yourself immersed in a dream world throughout the immersion. You begin seated on a mini castle wall, looking down onto a mini moat. This dreamy realm is a hand made castle and village collection found in the mountains. Next emerge down into the shallows with the fish. Admire the energetic, colorful water filled with playful fish. Finally you find yourself in a phenomenal environment meant for manifestations.

Purpose
Relaxation
Self meditation

Length
10:25

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
